amendment.description: An amendment numbered 114 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to strike funding for the Israeli Cooperative Programs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for the Israeli Cooperative Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 6 - 422 (Roll no. 207).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 6 - 422 (Roll no. 207).
